name: BCChildren'sHospitalWaitTimeSkill
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. c. children's wait times
des: This Alexa skill provides real-time emergency wait times for BC Children's Hospital, helping patients and families make informed decisions before heading to the hospital. Powered by data from edwaittimes.ca, the skill gives up-to-date information on current wait times at BC Children's Hospital, located at 4500 Oak Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada. This skill is specifically designed for users seeking emergency services at this location, ensuring that you have the latest wait time information directly through your Alexa device. Whether you're at home or on the go, this skill is a valuable tool for anyone planning a visit to the emergency department at BC Children's Hospital.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
